item.title: Who is bonoms?
item.description: Welcome to my website! If you’re curious about who I am, u’re in the right spot. Yes, I’ve changed a bit since then, but that’s life (fucking good song of FS). Currently, I’m studying Physical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano, but my home base is in Valtellina, a valley in the Italian Alps. Stick around!!
